title: ranked banner issue

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body: i dont know if it is because i was banned but i did not get my previous season ranked banned

replies.body: You must be Honour 2 or above at season end[*](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/TGYs0hwO-2018-end-of-season-rewards-and-honor) to receive ranked rewards.
not the rewards the banner that shows on your profile
unless that counts as a reward? anyways not too bad didnt want it to be silver anyways that shit is embarrassing xD

Banner flairs and borders fall under the ranked rewards umbrella, so anything that prevents you from earning ranked rewards will prevent you from earning those.

It is likely this will also apply to ranked armour next season, but we don't have full details on that yet.
okay cool thanks for the help
